additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Contains 1450 ppm Fluoride. Contains Sodium Saccharin. INGREDIENTS: Glycerol, Silicon Dioxide, Sodium Polymetaphosphate, Propylene Glycol, Macrogol 300, Water-purified, Zinc Lactate, Flavour, Stannous Fluoride, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Chondrus Crispus, Sodium Phosphate-tribasic, Xanthan Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Carnauba Wax, Pigment blue 15 CI 74160

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Caution: Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 12 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. If sensitivity symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional. Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 12 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor. If sensitivity symptoms persists, consult your healthcare professional.
